subject: Firearms
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The South Orange-Maplewood (N.J.) Baseball Committee turned down Matt Carmel’s offer to put up $300 to sponsor a team using the name of his business, Constitution Arms, a gun dealership.
snippet: The South Orange-Maplewood (N.J.) Baseball Committee turned down Matt Carmel’s offer to put up $300 to sponsor a team using the name of his business, Constitution Arms, a gun dealership.
